title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the choice of x = 1 only

1 point is earned for show (1,g(1)) is a point of inflection

1 point is earned for show (2,g(2)) is not a point of inflection

One; x = 1

On (-2, 1), g''(x) = f'(x) > 0

On (1, 2), g''(x) = f'(x) < 0

On (2, 4), g''(x) = f'(x) < 0

Therefore (1,g(1) is a point of inflection and (2, g(2)) is not.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the choice of x = 1 only

1 point is earned for show (1,g(1)) is a point of inflection

1 point is earned for show (2,g(2)) is not a point of inflection

One; x = 1

On (-2, 1), g''(x) = f'(x) > 0

On (1, 2), g''(x) = f'(x) < 0

On (2, 4), g''(x) = f'(x) < 0

Therefore (1,g(1) is a point of inflection and (2, g(2)) is not.
